mapper.select: SELECT urr.urr_info,urr.urr_firstpic,urr.urr_secondpic,urr.urr_thirdpic,urr.urr_time,u.user_name FROM urrelation urr,`user` u WHERE u.user_id = urr.user_id and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(urr.urr_time) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginTime}) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(urr.urr_time) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime})
mapper.sql: urr_id, user_id, road_id, urr_info, urr_firstpic, urr_secondpic, urr_thirdpic, urr_time
mapper.insert: insert into urrelation (urr_id, user_id, road_id, urr_info, urr_firstpic, urr_secondpic, urr_thirdpic, urr_time) values (#{urrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{urrInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urrFirstpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urrSecondpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urrThirdpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into urrelation
urr_id,
user_id,
road_id,
urr_info,
urr_firstpic,
urr_secondpic,
urr_thirdpic,
urr_time,
#{urrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update urrelation
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
road_id = #{roadId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
urr_info = #{urrInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urr_firstpic = #{urrFirstpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urr_secondpic = #{urrSecondpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urr_thirdpic = #{urrThirdpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urr_time = #{urrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where urr_id = #{urrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update urrelation set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, road_id = #{roadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, urr_info = #{urrInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urr_firstpic = #{urrFirstpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urr_secondpic = #{urrSecondpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urr_thirdpic = #{urrThirdpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urr_time = #{urrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where urr_id = #{urrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
